question: In a {n}-item quiz, {p1}% of the questions are {s1}, {p2}% are {s4}, and the rest are equally divided as {s2} and {s3} questions. If {name} is sure to get 25% of {s4} questions, {r1}% of the {s1} questions, and {frac} of the {s2} and {s3} questions correctly, how many points is she sure to get?
